text: Azure Mountain is a mountain in Waverly, Franklin County, New York. It is 2,323 feet (708 metres) tall. The Azure Mountain Fire Observation Station is a 35-foot-tall (11-m) steel tower on the mountain. It was built in 1918 and fixed up in 2002. In 2001, the fire tower became part of the National Register of Historic Places. == References == == Other websites == * Azure Mountain Friends * Clarkson University - Azure Mountain * The Fire Towers of New York Category:Geography of New York (state) Category:Mountains of the United States Category:Pages with unreviewed translations
title: Azure Mountain
